title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4D.05 - Application of Steady Signal Indications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4D.05 - Application of Steady Signal Indications

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Option: 04A If a protected U-turn movement is provided, and right
turns on red are allowed from the conflicting approach from the left, a RIGHT
TURN ON RED MUST YIELD TO U-TURN (R10-30) sign (see Section
2B.54
) may be used to advise road
users making the right turn on red of the operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
4D.05

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
